text: Auntie Deirdre and Beth are discussing Beth's plans for her mother's 40th birthday celebration. Beth suggests a girls' weekend with her mother, Auntie Deirdre, and the girls, including Kira who will come back from university. Auntie Deirdre agrees and encourages Beth to try working in the salon as a beauty therapist, which Beth is interested in. Auntie Deirdre offers to pay Beth for her work experience and suggests starting with a few hours on a Saturday for a couple of weeks. Beth agrees and looks forward to trying the beauty therapy side of the salon.
